subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kelly Johnson hit an R.B.I. double off Pedro Martínez in Atlanta’s three-run first inning and the Braves won to end the Mets’ three-game winning streak.
snippet: Kelly Johnson hit an R.B.I. double off Pedro Martínez in Atlanta’s three-run first inning and the Braves won to end the Mets’ three-game winning streak.
